channel.title: Kimi Research Articles & Technical Blogs
channel.description: Explore Kimi research articles, technical blogs, and benchmark releases

item.title: Kimi Agent Swarm: 100 Sub-Agents at Scale
item.description: Kimi Agent Swarm is a self-organizing multi-agent system that spawns up to 100 sub-agents to parallelize research, document synthesis, and multi-perspective analysis.

item.title: Kimi K2.5 Tech Blog: Visual Agentic Intelligence
item.description: Kimi K2.5 defines Visual Agentic Intelligence. Trained on 15T tokens, it introduces SOTA visual coding and autonomous agent swarm. Read the full tech blog.

item.title: WorldVQA: Measuring Atomic World Knowledge in MLLMs
item.description: WorldVQA is a benchmark designed to evaluate atomic vision-centric world knowledge in Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs).
